ping-results.description: List of VXLAN ping test results.

ping-result.description: Statistics of VXLAN ping test result.

loss-ratio.description: Packet loss ratio of a test.

rtt-min.description: Minimum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-max.description: Maximum RTT of all test packets.

rtt-average.description: Average RTT of all test packets.

probes.description: List of VXLAN ping results of all packets in a test.

probe.description: Statistics of probe result of a single packet in a VXLAN ping test.

index.description: Serial number of a test packet received.

replier.description: IPv4/IPv6 reply address in a received response packet.

packet-size.description: Number of bytes in a received response packet.

result-type.description: Result of sent packet (success or timeout or failed).

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

trace-results.description: List of VXLAN trace test results.

trace-result.description: Statistics of VXLAN trace test result.

hops.description: List of tracert results of all packets in a test.

hop.description: Statistics of the response result of a single packet in a VXLAN tracert test.

hop-index.description: Serial number of a hop in the test path.

replier.description: IPv4 destination address of the related hop in a test.

result-type.description: Result of sent packet (success or timeout or failed).

is-delete.description: Enable/disable the function of deleting test results.

diagnostic-tools_schema.description: Diagnosis tool, limited to ping and trace.
